Western Flyer Xpress Sponsored 🏁 Interested in better pay and equipment? Drive for WFX and you'll join a company that will work hard for you. WFX offers a career with competitive pay, great benefits, scheduled home time, and room for growth. WFX will put you into the one-of-a-kind Peterbilt 389, fully loaded, and 18-speed manual transmission to pull frac sand pneumatic trailers for our Energy fleet. • Pay starts at 30% of load and increases to 33% after 90 days. • Run 2-weeks with 4-days home time. ⚡ WFX knows this can be hard work and rewards drivers with better pay and better equipment. 🏁 Hiring CDL A Drivers for Energy Divison Requires a Class A CDL. 12 months of experience in the last 36 months. Ability to drive 18-speed manual transmission. Learn More

Western Flyer Xpress Sponsored 🎯 Ready to go further? WFX has a competitive offering for CDL-A Regional Drivers to transport goods across Midwest states. Average 2500 to 3000 miles per week (400 to 600 miles per load) and a home time reset of 34-48 hours. WFX Benefits: ➜ Late model and new equipment ➜ Company pay scale 50 to 60 CPM based on experience ➜ Benefits including Medical, Dental, Vision, Life and matching 401(k) after 60 days on the job ➜ Paid vacation after one year of service Requirements: ➜ Must live within 50 miles of Kansas City, Oklahoma City, Eau Claire, Denver, or Dallas ➜ Must be willing to pull Reefer ➜ 23 years of age or older ➜ A valid Class A CDL ➜ 6 months of verified OTR driving experience over the previous 36 months ➜ Any unpaid tickets or surcharges will be reviewed prior to offer of orientation ➜ No felony convictions in the previous 7 years Drive for WFX: ➜ Better Pay. Better Equipment. ➜ A dedicated team at our terminal that keeps you on the road, safe and making money. ➜ WFX is the only trucking company with a terminal on I-40 in the state of Oklahoma. 🎯 WFX is led by Randy Timms, a real truck driver with a 389 Peterbilt and active CDL-A, who makes sure everyone at WFX understands trucking is hard work and Driver's come first. FB.ME 🏁 Hiring Regional CDL-A Drivers Learn more
